summary: it’s that day of the week again~
body:
it’s that day of the week again~

so it’s time for

(Mostly) Taaco Twin Tuesday!

full disclosure, there’s gonna be a lot of Stealth Twin content because vax and vex are perfect. so it’s more of a….twin tuesday. listen, i’m just trying to post about my only interest (elven twins in dnd shows) the only way i know how.

summary: Breath and Life - steelneena - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Breath and Life - steelneena - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
description:
Day 2 of @widomauk-week

He’s bleeding out.

Caleb is bleeding out on the ground, and Molly’s chest is heaving from the exertion that it took to get to him, to get to his side. The clerics are busy keeping the rest up, and though Caduceus looked torn, he’d turned away upon seeing Molly dash to their fallen friend.

It’s the first time anyone has gone down since Molly’s been back and he doesn’t know what to do.

There’s blood everywhere. On the ground, in Caleb’s hair, on his chest and lips, even his long, lovely eyelashes. The sword had been wrenched from his body but spare seconds after the bugbear joined the fray. They hadn’t even seen him come up behind Caleb.

For all the many things Molly can do with blood, putting it back where it came from is not one of those things. He leans down, swords at his sides, to press both hands to the wound, watching as blood burbles at Caleb’s lips from the pressure. It’s not a good sign.

“Hang on, Caleb. Hang on. Just a little longer!”

READ MORE

summary: Did a quick draft of a painting of a scene in Critical Role campaign 2 episode 65. I took some liberties and decided that...
body: Did a quick draft of a painting of a scene in Critical Role campaign 2 episode 65. I took some liberties and decided that Caduceus cast daylight on his staff instead of the saddle cause then I could reference a particular scene from the Lord of the Rings.

blog.title: “No One Knows The Reason For All This,
blog.description:
But It Is Probably Quantum”.

Fandom blog, reblogging lots of awesome art and DA fics, plus some of my own.

Come join me for Dragon Age (mostly Origins), Critical Role (my current obsession) & Skyrim.

This is my drama free oasis, here to keep spirits up in the face of a less than fantastic reality.

Icon by @magpiesandmabari

summary: Okay. Okay, a lot just happened.  The Empire has another dodecahedron, possibly.  They’ve been doing some sketchy, unethical...
body:
Okay. Okay, a lot just happened. 

  • The Empire has another dodecahedron, possibly. 
  • They’ve been doing some sketchy, unethical experiments on the locals. 
  • Dunamancy- gravity, time, and entropy magic.
  • Nott’s friend Yeza might have been working with the Empire on those unethical experiments I mentioned.
  • Nott reacted very badly to all of these reveals, and snapped at Caleb.

reblog.comment:
